Room.Name: Plasnelt Road/Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is the eastern edge of the village, where Plasnelt Road ends.
Room.LongDescription: Taragon Road runs north and south, and a militia armory is on the corner. Long ago the wise village elders recognized the need for a militia, so they set up a barracks and recruited the nastiest and meanest citizens they could for the job. The tradition has continued to this day. However, knowing the ways of drunken militia, they wisely put the armory at the opposite end of town from the main barracks.
